From January 1, 1999, through December 31, 1999, a 7.25 percent deduction from basic pay applies to participants in the Foreign Service Retirement and Disability System. Additionally, eligible Foreign Service criminal investigators/inspectors have the same deduction from their basic pay during this period. The Foreign Service Retirement and Disability System deduction rate for participants from January 1, 1999, through December 31, 1999, is 7.25 percent. A conforming amendment was made to the Foreign Service Act of 1980 regarding this deduction rate. The Foreign Service Act of 1980 is amended to set the amount to be paid for volunteer service at 3.25 percent from January 1, 1999, through December 31, 1999.
